ygData.subject: Re: About Darkfox...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... LOL, yeah, 56 now.  But, I do remember the pure unadulterated PLing power when I hit 32 and grouped with 5 casters in Cazic. :) Even if we can t coordinate
ygData.messageBody:
> >Shoot me a tell sometime, if ya want. If you're around level
> >30, I'd love to group. I've always wanted to have another bard
> >in the group that knew enough about the songs and how to twist
> >to coordinate a 6 song crescendo of power that NONE CAN
> >WITHSTAND..MWHAHAHAHAA!
>
> I think Dark may be level 32 now, yes? *Smiles*
>
> Actually, if I remember correctly, Dark is a couple of levels ahead
> of me, so I would guess about 56 now.


LOL, yeah, 56 now. But, I do remember the pure unadulterated PLing
power when I hit 32 and grouped with 5 casters in Cazic. :)

Even if we can't coordinate a crescendo of power on creatures where
we'd both get exp, I am always willing to talk strategy.

I love the new and improved, more accurate Xegony Bard count macro. :)

Darkfox
